Ui.Script:
local function ShowDrakeishUIMessage() -- Color codes: Blizzard yellow, light blue, white local message = "~|cffffd700DrakeishUI|r |cffff8000by F@bagun|r: |cffffffffLoaded|r~" DEFAULT_CHAT_FRAME:AddMessage(message) end
-- Show message only once on PLAYER_LOGIN local frame = CreateFrame("Frame") frame:RegisterEvent("PLAYER_LOGIN") frame:SetScript("OnEvent", function(self, event) if event == "PLAYER_LOGIN" then ShowDrakeishUIMessage() -- Unregister the event so it only shows once self:UnregisterEvent("PLAYER_LOGIN") end end)
